name: Noble Vector - Early Access
description:
Triangles. They always have the glory, being the strongest shape and having an entire math study on just them. Squares. Easy to understand, but with only a fraction of that glory. It's time to become the beacon the squares need, as the Noble Vector!

Fight off hoards of triangles with your Isoce-Lance & Index Shot in this endless game of soon-to-be mayhem! MAYHEM!!

Controls:

Left Click - Isoce-Lance

Right Click - Index Shot

This game is currently in early access, and as such may have bugs or issues. If you encounter a major bug, please comment it so that in the full release it can (hopefully) be patched. 

Upcoming: Version 1.0.0 - Release

Current: Version 0.1.0 - Early Access
